name: canshare-skin-extremity-topography
title: NZ cancer skin of extremity topography
description: The body location used to describe the point of origin for skin cancer of the extremity or an 'Other' value.

filter.value: (^447551000210105 |New Zealand cancer skin topography reference set| AND <<116370005 |Skin structure of extremity (body structure)|) OR 74964007 |Other|
